articles.description: Follow live text updates and BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra commentary from qualifying at the Saudi Arabian Grand Prix.
articles.title: Bearman gets first taste of F1 qualifying in Saudi - radio and text

articles.description: England endured one of the toughest days on their tour of India, but Ben Stokes' return to bowling was the faintest of silver linings, says Stephan Shemilt.
articles.title: 'Stokes offers faint silver lining to England's day in the dirt'

articles.description: Premier League leaders Liverpool host champions Manchester City on Sunday in a huge clash at the top of the table as both sides chase history.
articles.title: 'I see excellence when I face it' - Klopp on Guardiola

articles.description: Ferrari's Carlos Sainz will miss the Saudi Arabian Grand Prix after being diagnosed with appendicitis and is replaced by British teenager Oliver Bearman.
articles.title: Saudi Arabian Grand Prix: Carlos Sainz ruled out and replaced by Oliver Bearman

articles.description: As Francis Ngannou aims to derail Anthony Joshua's plans of recapturing a world title, BBC Sport asks the boxing world for their predictions.
articles.title: Anthony Joshua v Francis Ngannou: Predictions from the world of boxing

articles.description: An intense work ethic and an eye for detail helped England defence coach Felix Jones overcome a career-ending neck injury to become a double World Cup-winning coach.
articles.title: Facing Ireland 'doesn’t pull on heart strings now'

articles.description: Earning Champions League qualification is "pointless" if Tottenham do not then "grow", says manager Ange Postecoglou.
articles.title: Top-four finish 'not a Willy Wonka golden ticket'

articles.description: In his latest BBC Sport column, Ireland hooker Rob Herring - currently out injured - discusses the aura of Twickenham and the threats England pose to the Six Nations champions on Saturday.
articles.title: 'England at Twickenham always a huge test for Ireland'

articles.description: Toulouse full-backs Ange Capuozzo and Blair Kinghorn are a safe bet to have a big say as Scotland visit Italy in the Six Nations, writes Tom English.
articles.title: Capuozzo v Kinghorn showdown set to light up Rome

articles.description: Boxer Cindy Ngamba tells BBC Sport about her journey from Cameroon to England and the challenges she has faced in trying to earn a spot at the 2024 Paris Olympics.
articles.title: Paris Olympics: Cindy Ngamba on fighting for British citizenship and her dream of competing at the Games
